pullrequest.title: Attach model plugins to corresponding models in the world tab

content.raw:
Can you move these down? The order in which things are declared in headers should be:

1. public functions
1. protected functions
1. private functions
1. public members
1. protected members
1. private members

And please document the new members as well.
content.html:
Can you move these down? The order in which things are declared in headers should be:

  1. public functions
  2. protected functions
  3. private functions
  4. public members
  5. protected members
  6. private members

And please document the new members as well.
